Changes from last version

Classes

Modified classes
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Algorithm
    • Added: rdfs:comment "An algorithm is a specified set of instructions, independent of its implementation."@en
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fn-algorithm
    • Added: "A function can be implemented using a known algorithm (e.g., Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm), or use a combination of multiple algorithms to solve a certain problem. A function does not have to be implemented by any algorithm or have to be mapped one-on-one to an algorithm. It is not required to have a one-to-one mapping between an algorithm and a problem."@en
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "A declaration of an algorithm. An algorithm is a specified set of instructions, independent of its implementation. There is no one-to-one mapping between an algorithm and a problem."@en
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Execution
    • Added: " An Execution is the assignment of the values of the Parameters of a Function. An Execution has as result the value of the Output of the Function."@en
    • Added: "stable"^^xsd:string
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fn-execution
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: rdfs:comment "An Execution is the connection between a Function and its Parameters and Outputs."@en
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "An execution is the connection between a function and its input and output values."@en
    • Deleted: "testing"^^xsd:string
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Function
    • Added: "stable"^^xsd:string
    • Added: rdfs:comment "A Function is a process that performs a specific task by associating one or more Parameters to an Output"@en
    • Added: "A Function is an actionable thing that can have input parameters, output, solve certain problems, and can be implemented using certain algorithms."@en
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fn-function
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Deleted: "testing"^^xsd:string
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "The declared function"@en
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Implementation
    • Added: "An Implementation depends on the used development context, i.e., the used programming language and execution environment. An Implementation could be, e.g., an NPM package."@en
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fno-implementation
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: rdfs:comment "An Implementation defines the internal workings of one or more Functions"@en
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "A certain implementation of a function"@en
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Mapping
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fno-Mapping
    • Added: rdfs:comment "A Mapping links (abstract) Functions and (concrete) Implementations"@en
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "A mapping connects a function to an implementation"@en
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#MethodMapping
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fno-MethodMapping
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Output
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fn-output
    • Added: rdfs:comment "An Output is the description of the output value of a Function."@en
    • Added: "A Function can have multiple outputs, just as, e.g., callbacks in JavaScript can return multiple results, or a function could throw multiple types of errors."@en
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: "stable"^^xsd:string
    • Deleted: "testing"^^xsd:string
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "The definition of an output of a function"@en
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Parameter
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fn-parameter
    • Added: rdfs:comment "A Parameter is the description of the input value of a Function."@en
    • Added: "A Function expects a list of Parameters. This description actually defines which predicates to use when binding the values to the execution of the Function. The parameters are ordered in a list, and each parameter defines the relationship that is used for the execution. For this, the fno:predicate predicate MUST be used. All predicates are allowed, except for rdf:type and fno:executes. A Parameter can have a specific type or other metadata (e.g., required or not, having a default value or not)."@en
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: "stable"^^xsd:string
    • Deleted: "testing"^^xsd:string
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "The definition of a parameter to a certain function"@en
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#ParameterMapping
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fno-ParameterMapping
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#Problem
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fn-problem
    • Added: "For example, a Function can solve the doing a sum problem, however, \"global warming\" could also be perceived as a problem, with no single function to solve it."@en
    • Added: rdfs:comment "A Problem is a general issue. Some problems can be solved by executing a certain Function."@en
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
    • Deleted: rdfs:comment "A certain problem that a function solves"@en
  • https://w3id.org/function/ontology#ReturnMapping
    • Added: https://w3id.org/function/spec/#fno-ReturnMapping
    • Added: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology
    • Deleted: rdfs:isDefinedBy https://w3id.org/function/ontology#
